logline: A sterile corporate boardroom morphs into a war room as executives grapple with a labyrinthine AI inversion map.
scene: In a dimly lit boardroom, a massive digital display flickers with a complex 'Inversion Map' teeming with color-coded nodes representing new scarcity categories. Around a sleek, ebony conference table, a diverse group of mid-level executives examine the projections with furrowed browsâ€”each one clutching personalized tablets that display real-time analytics on their industry's shifting value landscape. The atmosphere buzzes with urgency as conflicting opinions clash, revealing the palpable tension of impending obsolescence. A lone drone hovers above, scanning the room, capturing facial expressions and decision-making gestures, symbolizing the omnipresent eye of AI technology. Outside the expansive windows, a cityscape dominated by neon-lit skyscrapers hints at a society transformed by AI scarcity.
keyProps: A detailed digital 'Inversion Map' projected on the wall
A sleek conference table with scattered documents
An aerial drone surveying the meeting
Dimmed lighting with pulsating neon accents from the city
camera: A steady dolly shot that moves from one executive's anxious face to the projection, emphasizing their reactions.
lighting: Dim overhead lights with focused spotlights on the participants, creating a stark contrast with the vibrant colors of the digital display.
productionDesign: A futuristic corporate boardroom featuring a combination of sleek, minimalist design and high-tech interfaces; glass walls and a panoramic view of a cyberpunk cityscape enhance the tension.
signatureTwist: The projection subtly distorts as executives argue, indicating potential malfunctions in their reliance on AI-driven data.
